stnBgp.name: stnBgp
stnBgp.contactinfo: Spring Tide Networks, Inc. Customer Service Postal: 3 Clock Tower Place Suite 200 Maynard, MA 01754 USA Tel: +1 978 298 2000 Email: custserv@springtidenet.com
stnBgp.description: This MIB module describes managed objects of Spring Tide Networks BGP-4.

stnBgpRouteAttrTable.name: stnBgpRouteAttrTable
stnBgpRouteAttrTable.description: A table of BGP route attribute sets.

stnBgpRouteAttrEntry.name: stnBgpRouteAttrEntry
stnBgpRouteAttrEntry.description: Information about a particular set of BGP attributes.

stnBgpRouteAttrId.name: stnBgpRouteAttrId
stnBgpRouteAttrId.description: A unique integer identifing this row in the table.

stnBgpRouteAttrASPathSegment.name: stnBgpRouteAttrASPathSegment
stnBgpRouteAttrASPathSegment.description: The sequence of AS path segments. Each AS path segment is represented by a triple <type, length, value>. The type is a 1-octet field which has two possible values: 1 AS_SET: unordered set of ASs a route in the UPDATE message has traversed 2 AS_SEQUENCE: ordered set of ASs a route in the UPDATE message has traversed. The length is a 1-octet field containing the number of ASs in the value field. The value field contains one or more AS numbers, each AS is represented in the octet string as a pair of octets according to the following algorithm: first-byte-of-pair = ASNumber / 256; second-byte-of-pair = ASNumber & 255;

stnBgpRouteAttrRefCount.name: stnBgpRouteAttrRefCount
stnBgpRouteAttrRefCount.description: A number of BGP routes using this attibute set.

stnBgpRouteAttrLocPref.name: stnBgpRouteAttrLocPref
stnBgpRouteAttrLocPref.description: The originating BGP4 speaker's degree of preference for an advertised route. A value of -1 indicates the absence of this attribute.

stnBgpRouteAttrMultiExitDisc.name: stnBgpRouteAttrMultiExitDisc
stnBgpRouteAttrMultiExitDisc.description: This metric is used to discriminate between multiple exit points to an adjacent autonomous system. A value of -1 indicates the absence of this attribute.

stnBgpRouteAttrOrigin.name: stnBgpRouteAttrOrigin
stnBgpRouteAttrOrigin.description: The ultimate origin of the path information.

stnBgpRouteAttrNextHop.name: stnBgpRouteAttrNextHop
stnBgpRouteAttrNextHop.description: The address of the border router that should be used for the destination network.

stnBgpRouteAttrAtomicAggregate.name: stnBgpRouteAttrAtomicAggregate
stnBgpRouteAttrAtomicAggregate.description: Whether or not the local system has selected a less specific route without selecting a more specific route.

stnBgpRouteAttrAggregatorAS.name: stnBgpRouteAttrAggregatorAS
stnBgpRouteAttrAggregatorAS.description: The AS number of the last BGP4 speaker that performed route aggregation. A value of zero (0) indicates the absence of this attribute.

stnBgpRouteAttrAggregatorAddr.name: stnBgpRouteAttrAggregatorAddr
stnBgpRouteAttrAggregatorAddr.description: The IP address of the last BGP4 speaker that performed route aggregation. A value of 0.0.0.0 indicates the absence of this attribute.

stnBgpPrefixCount.name: stnBgpPrefixCount
stnBgpPrefixCount.description: Number of distinct prefixes in the local RIB.

stnBgpPathCount.name: stnBgpPathCount
stnBgpPathCount.description: Number of paths in the local RIB.

stnBgpSelectedPathCount.name: stnBgpSelectedPathCount
stnBgpSelectedPathCount.description: Number of paths selected for route table installation.

stnBgpPathAttributeCount.name: stnBgpPathAttributeCount
stnBgpPathAttributeCount.description: Number of entries in the path attribute database.

stnBgpPathAttributeTlvLength.name: stnBgpPathAttributeTlvLength
stnBgpPathAttributeTlvLength.description: Total length of all TLVs in the path attribute database.

stnBgp4PathAttrTable.name: stnBgp4PathAttrTable
stnBgp4PathAttrTable.description: A table of BGP path attributes.

stnBgp4PathAttrEntry.name: stnBgp4PathAttrEntry
stnBgp4PathAttrEntry.description: Additional information about a bgp path to a network.

stnBgp4PathAttrCommunities.name: stnBgp4PathAttrCommunities
stnBgp4PathAttrCommunities.description: The sequence of community numbers. Each AS community number is a 4-octet long unsigned integer

stnBgp4PathAttrImported.name: stnBgp4PathAttrImported
stnBgp4PathAttrImported.description: Variable indicates whether this path has been imported from the other portocol on this router.
